title: Realme UI 3.0 Open Beta & Early Access builds now available for the Realme X50 Pro, 8s, C25s, Narzo 50A, and more
content:
Over the last few months, Realme has rolled out Early Access, and Open Beta builds of Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12 to a bunch of its devices. If you haven’t received the update for your phone and you’ve been waiting to try out the latest version of Realme’s Android skin, we’ve got some

The post Realme UI 3.0 Open Beta & Early Access builds now available for the Realme X50 Pro, 8s, C25s, Narzo 50A, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme has opened Realme UI 3.0 Early Access & Open Beta programs for the Realme X50 Pro, 8s, C25, C25s, and Narzo 50A.
